author: Teresa Mull
title: A Monk’s Guide to Quarantine
description:
'This situation should cause us to be more dependent on God.'
The post A Monk’s Guide to Quarantine appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Fr. Ananias is a Benedictine monk who serves as the pastor of Queen of Peace Parish in Patton, Pennsylvania. Long before COVID-19, he voluntarily embraced a life of social-distancing and isolation from public life, in the monastery, Fr. Ananias has uncommon i… [+12705 chars]
